title: How to Make a Vegan Avocado Chocolate Cake

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.
steps.description: Line or grease the cake pan.

steps.headline: Add the flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda to the mixing bowl.
Add the vegetable oil, water, vinegar and vanilla in the other mixing bowl.
steps.description: Mix in the mashed avocado gradually.

steps.headline: Add the sugar to the bowl of wet ingredients.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients bowl.
Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
steps.description: Remove any leftover batter from the bowl and smooth the top with a spatula.

steps.headline: Place in the oven.
steps.description: Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a skewer inserted in the cake comes out clean.

steps.headline: Remove from the oven.
steps.description: Allow to cool in the pan for 5 minutes. Then tip onto a wire cooling rack lined with baking paper.

steps.headline: Ice when cooled.
steps.description: Simply sprinkling icing sugar over the top and adding flaked almonds makes a very effective look. You can also ice with avocado-based icing.

text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF. Line or grease the cake pan. Add the flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda to the mixing bowl. Mix to combine. Add the ground hazelnuts. Mix thoroughly. Add the vegetable oil, water, vinegar and vanilla in the other mixing bowl. Mix in the mashed avocado gradually. Add the sugar to the bowl of wet ingredients. Stir to combine. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients bowl. Stir together. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan. Remove any leftover batter from the bowl and smooth the top with a spatula. Place in the oven. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a skewer inserted in the cake comes out clean. Remove from the oven. Allow to cool in the pan for 5 minutes. Then tip onto a wire cooling rack lined with baking paper. Ice when cooled. Simply sprinkling icing sugar over the top and adding flaked almonds makes a very effective look. You can also ice with avocado-based icing.
tyn_model: ground hazelnuts. mix thoroughly. add the vegetable oil
